org.pepstock.charba.client.impl.plugins

Class DatasetsItemsSelectorOptionsBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.impl.plugins.DatasetsItemsSelectorOptionsBuilder

  • public final class DatasetsItemsSelectorOptionsBuilder
extends Object
    Comfortable object to create DatasetsItemsSelector.ID plugin options by a builder.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero
